plugins.name: ux-expert
plugins.description: Always-on UX advisor that surfaces relevant Laws of UX when building or modifying UI components. Covers 30 laws across decision-making, cognition, visual organization, memory, engagement, and design principles.

plugins.name: shadcn-ui-expert
plugins.description: Complete shadcn/ui component and chart code reference with all variants. Provides instant lookup for 54 base UI components and 7 Recharts chart types with full TSX code examples. Handles variant selection by asking the user.
